title: VISA 250 Introduction to Print Media
description: Visual print culture, and contemporary and historical technical print practices. Emphasis on hand-drawn intaglio, relief, screen and/or stencil printing, and graphic digital applications.
prerequisites: Minimum 72% in each of VISA 180 or 182, VISA 183 and VISA 110.  Students who do not have the appropriate pre-requisites will be de-registered and should contact the Department.
